name: tillywork
description: Tillywork is a self-hosted project and task management platform inspired by modern work tools. It supports boards, timelines, comments, and integrations, providing teams a focused environment to collaborate.
features: Project boards: Organize work into projects with kanban-style boards for visual task management.
Timeline views: Plan and visualize project schedules with Gantt-style timeline views for deadline tracking.
Task management: Create detailed tasks with descriptions, assignees, due dates, and custom fields.
Comments: Collaborate on tasks with threaded comments and mentions for team communication.
Integrations: Connect with external tools and services through webhooks and API integrations.
Custom workflows: Define custom statuses and workflows that match your team's processes.
File attachments: Attach documents and files to tasks for centralized project documentation.
Activity feeds: Track project activity and changes in real-time with comprehensive activity logs.
Team collaboration: Work together with team members on shared projects with role-based permissions.
Search and filter: Find tasks across projects using powerful search and filtering capabilities.
Notifications: Stay informed of task updates, mentions, and deadlines with customizable notifications.
Mobile responsive: Access projects from any device with a fully responsive web interface.
